titleStmt.title: A copy of the commission of array: granted from His Majesty to the Marquesse of Hertford. Read in the House of Commons, and ordered to be forthwith printed and published: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: August 24. 1642. London, Printed by L.N. and I.F. for E. Husbands and J. Franck, and are to be sold at their shops in the middle Temple, and the Kings-head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: William Seymour, Duke of Somerset, was earlier styled Marquis of Hertford.
Dated at end: York the second of August, 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shops in the middle Temple
